Header.title: Lending Katalyst
Header.paragraph: We simplify the hassle of tracing the title of your property in securing a collateral loan.

Ourstory.caption: The Beginning
content: Lending Katalyst was born out of curiosity. The inquisitive and customer-focused nature of the founders saw the technological gap in the banking industry. This strong desire of going beyond the conventional practice gave us the purpose to what we are today.
With a clear vision in mind, we are a team of passionate entrepreneurs ready to take on the challenge and face the uncertainty.
If you have the same passion and would like to be a part of this journey, kindly fill out your details in the 'Get In Touchâ€™ section. We would love to have you on board.

Whatwedo.caption: Changing the Status Quo
content: We are a legal tech start-up leveraging new-age technology to disrupt the long-standing manual procedure in tracing the title of a property.

With Lending Katalyst, we simplify this hassle of preparing a Title Search Report by providing an instant, unbiased decision with zero physical intervention in the journey of securing a home loan or mortgage loan from financial institutions.

OurTech.caption: An Instant Solution
content: At Lending Katalyst, we serve our clients through our dedicated portal by providing an instant, unbiased consolidated title report stating whether the property is fit for collateral or not in your journey of collateral loan.
This instant decision is made possible with our state-of-the-art Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning algorithm.
With a strong command over this technology, we are on a mission to disrupt collateral lending.
